fastapi_multihop_0040:

[FastAPI 0.99] Uses Pydantic v1 with class Config and @validator decorators

shared_intro: FastAPI is a modern, fast web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+ based on standard Python type hints.
shared_installation: Install FastAPI with: pip install fastapi[all]
shared_quickstart: Create a simple API with: from fastapi import FastAPI; app = FastAPI()
